definition: 10th earthly branch: 5-7 p.m., 8th solar month (8th September-7th October), year of the Rooster/ancient Chinese compass point: 270° (west)

sentences.english: Let the sleeping death seep through.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果醮毒，讓死之沉睡滲入。

sentences.english: Pile the filling into the centre, then wet the edges with a little water.
sentences.chinese: 把原料堆在中間，然後用少許水醮溼邊緣。

sentences.english: A three-day Qingjiao is made up of dozens of programs.
sentences.chinese: 一場三天的清醮由幾十出科儀節目組合而成。

sentences.english: He shall dip his finger into the blood and sprinkle it before the Lord seven times in front of the curtain.
sentences.chinese: 把指頭醮於血中，在耶和華面前對着幔子彈血七次。

sentences.english: Yan lived in a poor family when he was young and had to practice calligraphy on the wall by using mud.
sentences.chinese: 顏真卿少時家貧缺紙筆，用筆醮黃土水在牆上練字。

definition: the three sacrificial animals (originally cow, sheep and pig; later pig, chicken and fish)
Zaoshen, the god of the kitchen/also written 灶神
Zaoshen, the god of the kitchen

short slender pointed piece of metal, bamboo etc/skewer/prod used to extract samples from sacks of grain etc/(dialect) to stick in/to bolt (a door)/to arrange (flowers in a vase)/to graft (tree)/to pedicure/to peel (an apple etc)
